messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

help with oracle locations help locations hello please ask locations updated myself other members locations currently instead states also amsterdam location other members locations veer thank much events

The current input appears to be somewhat fragmented, so I'm paying close attention to repeated terms like "locations" to infer the core issue.
